articles.author: Kelly Martinez
articles.title: People Are Revealing The Grudges They Still Hold Against A Teacher, And These Stories Are Infuriating
articles.description: "I took a pretty good tumble in gym, and then my teacher made me walk/hobble up a flight of stairs alone. I asked for someone to help me, but she wouldn’t let anyone. It turned out that I had completely fractured one of the bones in my foot."
